thread.title: MRS WEST
thread.title_full: Low Cost Funeral reviewed by MRS WEST

author: MRS WEST
title: MRS WEST
text: The care I received for my late mother was helpful and sympathetic. Staff were patient and understanding and I felt that nothing was too much trouble. My only criticism would be the name - Low Cost Funerals. I know they are part of the Memoria group and I think this choice of name for the direct cremation section could put people off. No-one wants to feel that cost is an issue where saying goodbye to a loved one, or not doing the best for them. People might feel that your service may be lacking because it was low cost, which is not the case
